positions.description: Performed work related to the gathering and development of materials, and reporting of activities in support of the technical projects of an organization. Performed office automation work requiring the use of software applications and computer equipment. Prepared correspondence, reports, technical documents, graphs/charts, forms, and other office support materials. Planned, scheduled and conducted interviews to evaluate program and project operations. Analyzed current peer review practices in federal grants to develop and revise and recommend improvements. Recommended improvements to Grant Management Software. Analyzed management techniques, processes, and styles for improving organizational effectiveness. Recommended management approaches and work functions needing development and modification.
positions.title: Grants and Program Support Intern

positions.description: Responsible for the operation of a five building self-storage facility. Provided customer support by resolving complaints and ensuring total customer satisfaction. Received and processed monthly payments. Reviewed and analyzed all storage spaces on the site and planned for storage unit configurations that maximizes capacity and generate revenue at multiple sites. Negotiated monthly rates with new customers. Identified materials and supplies needed for repairs. Requested contract bids for maintenance and repairs. Responsible for the lease contract preparation and execution.
positions.title: Assistant Manager

positions.description: Responsible for personnel and administrative support of 500 personnel. Subject matter expert and adviser of personnel functions. Managed and analyzed reports of accountability, strength management, evaluations, awards, promotions, reductions, and legal actions. Managed a post office with two postal clerks and four mail handlers. Planned and led training exercise schedules. Planned logistical convoys that transported equipment and supplies to forward bases. Coordinated air transportation for personnel throughout the combat theater of operations. Performed program analyst duties in a tactical operations center during combat operations.
positions.title: Human Resources Specialist

headline: Experienced HR Professional, US Army Veteran, Future Business Leader
